location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located at the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between HM Minister at Kabul and the Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs, consisting of an enquiry into the whereabouts of a Mrs Hiller, and her subsequent location at an address in London.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs
